title: 13-year-old boy shot, critically injured
content:
ORLANDO, Fla. —
Deputies are investigating a shooting that sent a 13-year-old boy to a hospital with critical injuries, the Orange County Sheriff’s Office said.
Authorities said the shooting happened shortly after 1 p.m. in the 4700 block of Spottswood Drive, in the Conway Acres Subdivision. The 13-year-old victim was visiting relatives when he was shot, deputies said.
The boy was taken to Arnold Palmer hospital where he is in critical condition, the sheriff’s office said.
WESH 2 News has a crew on the scene and we will bring you updates as they become available.
